alert.note: Alert for La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Upper Rio Grande Valley, Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 2:59PM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM SUNDAY TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected, with widespread blowing and drifting snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Western Mosquito Range and East Lake County Above 11000 Feet, Leadville Vicinity and Lake County Below 11000 Feet, Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Feet, La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Feet and Upper Rio Grande Valley and Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Feet. * WHEN...From 2 AM Sunday to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
